title: Srimad Bhagavatam - Canto 1 Chapter 2 | Kids Quiz (10Q)

questions.prompt: What do the sages ask Suta Gosvami to explain in Chapter 2?
choices: Ways to get lots of money
questions.feedback: The sages want to know the best duty that helps everyone.

questions.prompt: What is the highest duty for all people?
questions.feedback: Serving the Lord with love is the highest duty.

questions.prompt: What feeling comes from loving service to the Lord?
questions.feedback: Loving service brings peace and happiness to the heart.

questions.prompt: What happens when work does not help us remember the Lord?
choices: It does not help the soul
questions.feedback: Work is useful when it helps us remember the Lord.

questions.prompt: What should we do when we do not feel satisfied?
questions.feedback: Learning about the soul helps us feel truly satisfied.

questions.prompt: What shows that a religion is true?
choices: It helps us love the Lord
It brings us lots of money
questions.feedback: True religion helps us grow love for the Lord.

questions.prompt: What should loving service to the Lord be free from?
questions.feedback: Loving service should be free from selfish wishes.

questions.prompt: What happens when we sincerely serve the Lord?
questions.feedback: Serving the Lord sincerely brings joy to the heart.

questions.prompt: How does the Lord respond to loving devotion?
questions.feedback: The Lord is pleased when devotion is sincere.

questions.prompt: What is the main message of Chapter 2?
questions.feedback: Chapter 2 teaches us to love and serve the Lord.
